T02D3313:11b-1: manydzu shr'i badzra s'a dha nam /
T02D3313:11b-4: bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3313:11b-5: rin chen padma r'a ga ltar //
T02D3313:11b-6: shes rab mchog ldan mdangs gsal ba //
T02D3313:11b-7: 'jam pa'i rdo rje la btud nas //
T02D3313:11b-8: de yi sgrub thabs 'di brtsam bya //
T02D3313:11b-9: dang por mal nas langs te gdong la sogs pa dag par bya ste /
T02D3313:11b-10: rang gi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom ste /
T02D3313:11b-11: de las byung ba'i 'od zer gyis bgegs rnams phyogs bcur bskrad par bya ste /
T02D3313:11b-13: aom aa mri ta kunda li h'um phat /
T02D3313:11b-14: de nas nam mkha' la gnas pa'i sangs rgyas dang /
T02D3313:11b-15: byang chub sems dpa' rnams gsal bar dmigs te /
T02D3313:11b-16: yid kyis mchod pa byas te ;
T02D3313:11b-17: bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje spyan drang bar bya'o //
T02D3313:11b-18: aom ae hye hi bha ga b'a na manydzu badzra
T02D3313:11b-19: ma ma sha r'i re ma tishtha nam ku ru
T02D3313:11b-20: sv'ah'a / de nas snying ga'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D3313:11b-21: gyi steng du 'jam pa'i rdo rje sku mdog dmar
T02D3313:11b-22: bo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D3313:11b-23: phyag gnyis na rdo rje dang dril bu 'chang ba /
T02D3313:11b-24: rma bya'i khri la rdo rje skyil mo krung du bzhugs shing /
T02D3313:11b-25: mo ha ku ma ri dang /
T02D3313:11b-26: r'a ga ku ma ri dang /
T02D3313:11b-27: air sha ku ma ri dang /
T02D3313:11b-28: ku la ku ma ri ste lha mo bzhi'o //
T02D3313:11b-29: dkyil 'khor gyis yongs su bskor bar bsam par bya'o //
T02D3313:11b-30: de dag kyang phyag gnyis ni rdo rje dang ral
T02D3313:11b-31: gri bsnams pa rma bya'i khri la rdo rje skyil
T02D3313:12a-1: 'jo sgeg dang bcas bzhin rab tu bzhugs pa'o //
T02D3313:12a-2: sku mdog ni bcom ldan 'das dang mtshungs par bsam par bya'o //
T02D3313:12a-4: de dag ni 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i yi ge drug pa'i gsang sngags so //
T02D3313:12a-9: de dag ni lha mo bzhi'i yi ge bzhi pa'i gsang sngags so //
T02D3313:12a-10: mchod pa'i dus su phyi rol du padma 'dab ma bzhi byas shing dmigs te /
T02D3313:12a-11: dbus kyi lte ba la bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal rdo rje ji lta ba bzhin bsam pa dang /
T02D3313:12a-12: shar phyogs la sogs pa'i 'dab ma bzhi la lha
T02D3313:12a-13: mo bzhi ji lta ba bzhin bsams la gsang sngags
T02D3313:12a-14: gong ma rnams kyis rim bzhin du mchod par bya'o
T02D3313:12a-15: // de nas gsang sngags 'dis 'byung po rnams la gtor ma sbyin par bya ste /
T02D3313:12a-16: mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya dang se gol lan gsum gtog cing /
T02D3313:12a-17: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am /
T02D3313:12a-18: a'adya nutpan na tv'at ces bya ba'i sngags 'dis sbyin par bya'o ;
T02D3313:12a-19: / de nas smon lam 'di lan gsum brjod par bya ste /
T02D3313:12a-20: phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mthar thug pa'i //
T02D3313:12a-21: sems can khams ni rab grol zhing //
T02D3313:12a-22: 'jam dpal sbyong pa ji bzhin du //
T02D3313:12a-23: de bzhin bdag ni sbyod gyur cig / bcom ldan
